membership
Class MSView

java.lang.Object
  membership.MSView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MSView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class implements the global view of the membership.

Version:
1.0
See Also:

 void addGlobalMember(MSViewLocal group)

 int updateGlobalView(MSView view)
          Update the local view from the parameter view, given the following rules : - The local view is not modified as the current information is considered more accurate - If a group doesn't exist inside the global view, add it

updateGlobalView

public int updateGlobalView(MSView view)
Update the local view from the parameter view, given the following rules : - The local view is not modified as the current information is considered more accurate - If a group doesn't exist inside the global view, add it. - If an existing group has been modified, replace it.

Parameters:
view - : The received view
